english: Police were called in to break up the meeting .
chinese: 出动了警察将集会驱散。

english: He gave us sunday as our day of meeting .
chinese: 他指定星期日为我们的集会日。

english: The party broke up when police arrived .
chinese: 警察到达时集会就散了。

english: I met him at a rendezvous outside the city .
chinese: 我在城外约定的集会中和他会晤。

english: The meeting did n't break up until noon .

chinese: 集会造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: At every rally somebody sooner or later heckled .
chinese: 每次集会上迟早总有人这样诘问。
庆祝的集会举行得很顺利。

english: The party broke up in silence and dismay .
chinese: 这次的集会就在沉默和忧郁的气氛中散场。

english: The congress shall assemble at least once in every year .
chinese: 国会应至少每年集会一次。

english: The presence of the premier shed lustre on the assembly .
chinese: 总理的光临为集会增添了光彩。

english: That stormy little meeting ended inconclusively .
chinese: 这一场疾风暴雨的小集会竟然弄得毫无结果。

english: They would not assemble unless a white person was present .
chinese: 没有白人在场，他们不得聚众集会。

english: Everyone at the rally wore red ribbons as favors .
chinese: 参加集会的人都系着红丝带作为支持大会的标记。
